categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: J'ilk Torlin was a male Ishi Tib Jedi Master who used a training remote to teach his students.

This Jedi was the creation of artist Joe Corroney. Note that, though the character is official, his name is not: it is the name given the character on Joe Corroney's website. The name was given to the character by fan Joshua Schmucker. Thus, the name "J'ilk Torlin" is not a part of strict canon.
